data.name: The Room of Black & White
data.detailed_description:
The Room of Black & White is a story about one girl entering a mysterious room.
The player will take the role of a girl named 'Diane' and will have to clear the Keepers' quest in order to escape

Why has she come here and why does she have to clear quests in ?
The player's task is to unravel her memories and find the truth.
Quests are going hard as story goes on.

What will face Diane as she attempts to escape ?


key Features

  • This Game Is Inspired By Chess.
  • The visual design consists solely of black & white.
  • The player will explore four different themes during their quest.
  • Find scattered memories to uncover the mysteries of the game's perplexing story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
